name: NORCO Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd
overview:
NORCO has become one of the leading design and manufacturing companies in the industrial PC field. NORCO has a wide range of products covering CPU card, embedded industrial motherboard, industrial computer, industrial workstation, Panel PC, firewall, storage array(inc. NAS) , industrial power supply, industrial chassis, passive backplane, industrial computer accessories and IO adapters. The products of our self-owned brand-NORCO are widely used in computer-based applications, including military, communication, material, industrial automation, energy, traffic, aviation, health care, network, AI (artificial intelligence), security, vehicle, banking and entertainment etc. Norco serves a vertical market with over 30 branches across the nation providing an on-site seamless service.

After 20 years of strenuous efforts, NORCO has been praised by IT giants such as Intel and Microsoft. NORCO is a member of Intel Embedded and Commutations Alliance (ECA), cooperative partner of Microsoft Embedded Program. And NORCO has elevated to associate level in Intel Embedded Alliance.

Additionally, NORCO provides tailored OEM & ODM solutions. NORCOâ€™s professional ODM/OEM service provides customers the competitive advantages with the effective reduction of the TSC (Total System Cost) and time-to-market.
